_header: Lady queen I pray Thee to govern me in good lore
Subjects: Christ, blood of; Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer by Christ’s shedding blood — five monorhyming quatrains

BodLatLitE17.First Lines:
LAdi quene y pray the to gouerne me in gode loreAnd haue þou
                    mercy on me aftur my deth and als byfore…
BodLatLitE17.Last Lines:
…And for Ire the seueth synne to suffre al þis has he
                    mentLady wyssche vs heuen to wynne and to þi son thow vs
                    present
